analysis.description:
bitvimToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/23/0xc7fb2b473915544ab2e76f7b9f2fde211119b654.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0xc7fb2b473915544ab2e76f7b9f2fde211119b654.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0xc7fb2b473915544ab2e76f7b9f2fde211119b654.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/23/0xc7fb2b473915544ab2e76f7b9f2fde211119b654.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0xc7fb2b473915544ab2e76f7b9f2fde211119b654.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
